original_title: Das leise Rauschen zwischen den Dingen
overview: George is in his 40s, a family man, on the fast track in his job - until one day a stranger claims ownership of 2m² of his house, enters the home, sets up his bed in the living room and stays. While the stranger is expanding his space in the house bit by bit, a gloomy feeling is taking hold of George.
title: A Gentle Noise Between the Lines
